attributes.action: Fines Must be increased in line with Inflation each year.
attributes.additional_details:
Fines must increase each year to stop them being a laugh, a £50 fine is nothing today and outdated, the fine start should be £100 start and kept up to date, at this time they get left behind with wage rises.

This makes a kick in the face for Victims.

Should be common sense with the Law makers but not at this time.

Action for the victims must be a must.
